name: GhostHunt
description:
GhostHunt is inspired by the classic arcade Duck Hunt game by Nintendo. It is an endless gun shooter video game with Halloween theme where you have to shoot flying pumpkins, ghosts and bats!

Each level consists of 10 rounds and in each round you have three shots to hit the enemies that appear on the screen. If you miss less than 6 enemies in a level, you go to the next level where the enemies are faster.  Compete for a high score and test your shooting skills to see how far you can go in the game!

> Keep an eye for a witch that appears randomly. You get bonus scores after hitting the witch three times.

> Pressing Enter unlocks the crazy mode!

Made with Unity 2020.1.7f1
